```diff
                            key={key} 
-                           className={`key ${keyboardManager.isKeyPressed() ? 'pressed' : ''}`}
+                           className={`key ${keyboardManager.isKeyPressed(key) ? 'pressed' : ''}`}
                          >
                            {key.replace('Arrow', '')}
```
